text: Hi guys, I am creating my first theme in HubSpot and I wanted to know if you know any technique to make it responsive, I attach an image where I explain the following, within a section I have 2 columns with a width=6 each, how can I do so that in mobile width=12 each column? Hi <@U051JFCM5B2> It will automatically take full width in mobile as these will add span6 and span6 in your web page. To check styling of span6 in mobile refer layout.css of your theme.
